description.en: Here you will find the vocabulary from Unit 6 Lesson B in the Four Corners 4 coursebook, such as "outgoing", "competitive", "psychology", etc.
description.id: Di sini Anda akan menemukan kosa kata dari Unit 6 Pelajaran B di Four Corners 4 Course, seperti "keluar", "kompetitif", "psikologi", dll.

en.long: to accept something to be true even without proof

id.long: menerima sesuatu untuk menjadi kenyataan bahkan tanpa bukti

en.long: referring to a situation in which teams, players, etc. are trying to defeat their rivals

id.long: mengacu pada situasi di mana tim, pemain, dll. Mencoba mengalahkan saingan mereka

en.long: a field of science that studies the mind, its functions, and how it affects behavior

id.long: bidang sains yang mempelajari pikiran, fungsinya, dan bagaimana hal itu mempengaruhi perilaku

en.long: a colorful thin book that has news, pictures, and stories about different things like fashion, sports, and animals, usually issued weekly or monthly

id.long: Buku tipis berwarna-warni yang memiliki berita, gambar, dan cerita tentang berbagai hal seperti mode, olahraga, dan hewan, biasanya dikeluarkan mingguan atau bulanan

en.long: enjoying other people's company and social interactions

id.long: menikmati perusahaan orang lain dan interaksi sosial
